description: Put a healthier twist on the classic Florentine pizza with this nutritionally approved recipe. This delicious version is packed with veggies and cheese.
name: Florentine Pizzas Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 230°C/210°C fan-forced. Line two baking trays with baking paper. Place bread rounds on trays and brush with 2 tsp oil.
Heat remaining oil in a large saucepan over medium heat. Cook herbs and spinach, stirring, for 1 minute or until spinach has just wilted. Season with pepper.

Spread cottage cheese evenly over each bread round. Top with spinach mixture and tomato, leaving space in the centre of pizza for the eggs. Crack 2 eggs into the centre of each pizza. Bake for 14 minutes or until egg is cooked through and bases are golden. Serve topped with basil.
